nodes.text: The Celestial Crow was a light freighter owned by Feylara Raed during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. One of Skavak's lovers, Raed lured Skavak's rival to her ship by pretending that it was crippled, and attempted to kill the smuggler once they docked.
The Celestial Crow first appeared in the 2011 BioWare massively-multiplayer online role-playing video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in the Smuggler Story mission "Distressed".
